standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no refund policy or non-refundable clause
standard_clauses.plain_english: Consumers have the right to refund for defective goods or deficient services.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: उपभोक्ताओं को दोषपूर्ण वस्तुओं या अपर्याप्त सेवाओं के लिए वापसी का अधिकार है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Consumer shall be entitled to a full refund within [X] days for defective products.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no warranty or warranty voiding conditions are unfair
standard_clauses.plain_english: Product warranty terms must be clearly stated.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: उत्पाद वारंटी शर्तें स्पष्ट रूप से बताई जानी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The product carries a warranty of [X] months from date of purchase.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: misleading advertising or false claims in contract
standard_clauses.plain_english: Contract should not contain misleading claims about product/service.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: अनुबंध में उत्पाद/सेवा के बारे में भ्रामक दावे नहीं होने चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: All product specifications and claims are accurate as stated.

standard_clauses.plain_english: Manufacturer/seller cannot completely waive liability for product defects.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: निर्माता/विक्रेता उत्पाद दोषों के लिए पूरी तरह दायित्व छोड़ नहीं सकते।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Manufacturer/Seller shall be liable for damages caused by product defects.
